comments.author: RikandMorty1
comments.body: Quote from: marcotheminer on August 06, 2022, 03:28:47 PMScared money don't make no money You don't exactly have the best loan history here on bitcointalk so it may be hard to find someone who is willing to take the risk. You don't seem to be willing to provide any sort of collateral either, which doesn't help.

comments.author: marcotheminer
comments.body: Quote from: RikandMorty1 on August 06, 2022, 03:34:45 PMQuote from: marcotheminer on August 06, 2022, 03:28:47 PMScared money don't make no money You don't exactly have the best loan history here on bitcointalk so it may be hard to find someone who is willing to take the risk. https://i.imgur.com/hE9ehO8.pngYou don't seem to be willing to provide any sort of collateral either, which doesn't help.Thanks for the feedback. I understand your point of view. I would like to say first off, 2019 - and if one were to look into the context of each situation and seek to understand it, imo (obviously), you'd truly be left with no qualms. Looking beyond these 'bold warnings from forum authoritative figures' helps reassure you too. Look into who they are too. These markers all seem to want to show me being late as an equivalent of me defaulting/disappearing, to really *attempt to* wreck any trust in me on this forum, but I digress.If I had the possibility of collateral, I think I would have converted it into liquid by now. Though, I do have real life context that confirms sufficient revenue for a loan of this size/interest/term.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Before I consider your request I think it's fair to ask what your involvement is with 2double0?

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on August 24, 2022, 12:50:38 PMBefore I consider your request I think it's fair to ask what your involvement is with 2double0?So, it's been two days since I've asked the question and you've been online multiple times.  Are you ignore me?  Is 2double0 your alt account?It seems like you had some claim over this account for quite some time according to this review you left for 2double0, I got this from your trust wall:Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=147773 2double0    2019-01-27        OPEN LOAN. I have loaned this user and am waiting on more repayments. Account cannot be used as collateral.Please let me know how you are involved with this account.

comments.author: marcotheminer
comments.created_time: August 30, 2022, 11:59:14 AMLast edit: August 30, 2022, 09:49:02 PM by Mr. Big
comments.body: I simply had not seen your reply here... For a next time, I ask kindly that you message me first (before assuming I am ignoring you).Now that I am aware: I will get around to addressing your questions as soon as I can.While I'm here: pausing this loan request.
